Package com.example.eventapp.ui.events

package com.example.eventapp.ui.events
  • Class
    Description
    CreateEventConfirmFragment
     
    CreateEventDatesFragment
     
    CreateEventFragment
    A Fragment that provides a form for creating a new event, with a flow that travels to nearby fragments.
    DatePickerFragment
    DatePickerFragment is a dialog fragment that displays a date picker to the user.
    EditEventFragment
    EditEventFragment is a BottomSheetDialogFragment that provides an interface for users to edit an existing event's details, such as name, description, duration, registration deadline, geolocation requirements, max entrants, and poster image.
    EntrantsAdapter
    Adapter class for displaying a list of entrants in a RecyclerView.
    EntrantsAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class to hold and manage views for individual entrant items.
    EventAdapter
    EventAdapter is a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of Event objects in a RecyclerView.
    EventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
     
    EventAdapter.ViewHolder
     
    EventInfoFragment
    A fragment displaying detailed information about an event in a bottom sheet dialog.
    EventMapFragment
    This is the fragment for the map view which allows the organizers to see where their entrants joined from if they have geolocation on
    EventsFragment
    The EventsFragment class is responsible for displaying and managing the user's events, including events they organize and events they are signed up for.
    EventsListAdapter
    EventListAdapter is an adapter that populates the actual list of events, given from the main EventsFragment.
    EventsListAdapter.ViewHolder
    Initializes the ViewHolder, so that the grid can be populated
    LotteryDrawCountInputFragment
    Used to prompt the user to input how many entrants on the waiting list they want to draw (for the invitation to enroll.)
    ManageQRCodeFragment
    This is used by the organizer/admin to view and manage the qr-code of an event.
    NotificationMessageInputFragment
    Used to prompt the user for the contents of the custom message they want to send to the entrants they selected.
    ScannedEventFragment
    This is the fragment that displays the information of the event corresponding to the qr code that was scanned.
    ViewEntrantsFragment
    Fragment for displaying the entrants for a given event Has options to filter based on the status of the entrants The user can navigate to the map view if the event has geolocation turned on.
